categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Krynda Draay's sister was the half-sister of Krynda Draay. She died in the Great Sith War, apparently in 3997 BBY. Her death, as well as that of her husband and Jedi Master, hit Krynda very hard. It took four years for her to resume training Padawans.
